name: Keep Away (ViolinLloyd)
description:
Keep Away is a Landscape arcade game for the Magic Leap One, built in Lumin Runtime. Control your green avatar and avoid the red and blue enemies to survive as long as possible! Use the local leaderboard to keep track of your scores and improve over time! Easy to pick up and play quick games, perfect for an ML1 Landscape game!

INSTRUCTIONS

Tap on the Control touchpad to move. Tap near the top to move up, right to move right, etc.
